Spokane.Felts Field History:
Felts Field, the historic airfield of Spokane, Washington, is located on the south bank of the Spokane River and east of Spokane proper.
Aviation activities began there in 1913, 105 years ago. In 1920 the field, then called the Parkwater airstrip, was designated a municipal flying field at the instigation of the Spokane Chamber of Commerce.
